original_text: And the smoke of their torment will rise for ever and ever. There will be no rest day or night for those who worship the beast and its image, or for anyone who receives the mark of its name.”
korean_text: 그 고난의 연기가 세세토록 올라가리로다 짐승과 그의 우상에게 경배하고 그의 이름 표를 받는 자는 누구든지 밤낮 쉼을 얻지 못하리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And the smoke of their torment
will rise for ever and ever
There will be no rest day or night
sentences.korean_translation: 낮이나 밤이나 쉴 수 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for those who worship the beast
or for anyone who receives the mark
